entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 11.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High 11. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 6:20 PM EDT Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few rain showers beginning late in the evening then changing to snow or ice pellets after midnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 6:20 PM EDT Wednesday 12 April 2023
